snippet.title: PetDrivr | Oculus Go + Gear VR
snippet.description:
On PetDriver you can help these wonderful animals to arrive at different destinations.

A game which the animals should be taken to innumerous places and you are the driver!

However, be careful! Each animal has a unique personality and age, which requires different levels of attention on curves and velocities.

Feel free to choose the best path but, watch out!  The time and the animals comfort are essential to your mission success!
